test
module test #(
parameter 
ADDRESS_WIDTH
 = 
32,
parameter 
BUS_WIDTH
 = 
4
) ( input clk, input rst, inout [ADDRESS_WIDTH-1:0] b_addr, inout b_we, inout b_cs, inout [(BUS_WIDTH*8)-1:0] b_data )

Test bench loop busbase example

Parameters
ADDRESS_WIDTH
parameter

Width of the address in bits.

BUS_WIDTH
parameter

Width of the data in bytes.

Ports
clk

Clock for all devices in the core

rst

Negative reset

b_addr

address to read write from

b_we

write enable 1, read 0

b_cs

chip select, 1 selected

b_data

data input/output
